pkgmetadata.longdescription: BFV, BGV, CKKS Schema for Fully Homomorphic Encryption // Implements the Brakerski-Fan-Vercauteren (BFV, 2012) https://eprint.iacr.org/2012/144, Brakerski-Gentry- Vaikuntanathan (BGV, 2014) doi:10.1145/2633600, and Cheon-Kim- Kim-Song (CKKS, 2016) https://eprint.iacr.org/2016/421.pdf schema for Fully Homomorphic Encryption, as well as several helper functions.
